name: Solitaire Game Christmas
description:
The 12 days of Christmas. What do they have in store for you?

On the first day of Christmas we gave to you: exciting gameplay! Make chains of cards and remove the golden cards to complete the level!

On the second day of Christmas we brought for you: 120 new and unique levels – that's 120 new, original games of solitaire.

On the third day of Christmas we got a special gift for you: 12 luxurious Christmas-themed locations!

On the fourth day of Christmas we present to you: over 15 hours of gameplay!

On the fifth day of Christmas we made for you: two difficulty modes – novice and professional. Choose the one that will make the game comfortable and fun for you.

On the sixth day of Christmas we gave to you: premium-quality graphics in a Christmas setting!

On the seventh day of Christmas we want you to kick back with Christmas-themed music. Our relaxing tracks won't distract you from the game.

On the eighth day of Christmas we got you three in-game bonuses to help you complete levels faster and easier: shuffle, mulligan and the Joker. Find the special bonus cards or buy them in the shop!

On the ninth day of Christmas we offer you the chance to get bonus coins by making a 25-card chain!

On the tenth day of Christmas, we got a surprise for you: 9 themed card backs with different color sets and Christmas symbols!

On the eleventh day of Christmas we got you: three styles of decks – classical, letters and numbers, and a special Christmas style. Choose the one you like most and enjoy playing solitaire!

On the twelfth day of Christmas we made you more than 20 special tasks and beautiful winter trophies for fans of excitement.

This game is the perfect Christmas present for solitaire fans! Merry Christmas and Happy New Year!
